heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Highs mainly in the low to mid 40s, some upper 40s south. South winds 5 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph, except possibly gusting to 45 mph in the Champlain Valley and in far northern New York.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy with areas of fog. Some brief wintry mix possible northeast, otherwise rain developing. Temperature rising through the 30s east, in the 40s and rising west. South winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting from 40 to 60 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain likely, and mixing with or changing to snow in the afternoon. Morning highs from the mid 40s to mid 50s. South to southwest winds 10 to 20 mph, and gusting from 40 to 55 mph, becoming west by afternoon.
